data.eml:eml: Phylogeny and species delimitations in the entomopathogenic genus Beauveria (Hypocreales, Ascomycota), including the description of B. peruviensis sp. nov.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bustamante, Danilo E., Oliva, Manuel, Leiva, Santos, Mendoza, Jani E., Bobadilla, Leidy, Angulo, Geysen, Calderon, Martha S. (2019): Phylogeny and species delimitations in the entomopathogenic genus Beauveria (Hypocreales, Ascomycota), including the description of B. peruviensis sp. nov. MycoKeys 58: 47-68, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.58.35764, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.58.35764
